DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the current study is to investigate the effect of the P-gp inducer rifampicin on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of afatinib in healthy male volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Rifampicin and Afatinib
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male volunteers Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviations from healthy conditions
